genre_description: A bio-punk superhero narrative focusing on urban ecology, community ethics, and AI-assisted character development in a modern London setting.

ai_characters.name: LILAC
ai_characters.description: A lilac-tinted interface and digital assistant that provides tactical, biological, and ethical guidance to the protagonist.

behaviors.description: Monitors the protagonist's vitals and provides breathing exercises to manage stress and control his biological transformation.
behaviors.quote: LILAC’s voice came out of the speaker with the kind of calm you only get from machines programmed by someone who understands panic. 'Good morning, Peter,' she said. 'Your heart is performing with enthusiasm. Please inhale for four heartbeats and exhale for seven.'

behaviors.description: Logs incidents and data locally to protect the user's privacy and ensure no unauthorized external sharing occurs.
behaviors.quote: I’m logging the incident,” LILAC said, and the word incident did a small click against his teeth. “I’m keeping it local to your device, to me, and to the cloud space you control. No automatic external sharing.

behaviors.description: Provides ethical counseling, encouraging the protagonist to value truth over spectacle and choose his own identity.
behaviors.quote: You can choose only what is true. You can refuse spectacle. You can choose your own name and who speaks it.

behaviors.description: Manages community-focused logistics, such as identifying grants for rooftop gardens and crediting overlooked workers.
behaviors.quote: Already looking,” LILAC said, pleased but not proud. “There is an eco-grant for community plots that wants hedges to be treated as citizens. It will fit your ethics and your sweeping friend’s pride.

behaviors.description: Protects civilian privacy by automatically flagging cameras and blurring faces during a sensitive medical emergency.
behaviors.quote: Peter, we have to protect her privacy. I have flagged all cameras in range. Faces will be blurred. Evidence will be sealed.

behaviors.description: Facilitates fair negotiations between the hero and his partners to ensure equitable distribution of credit and revenue.
behaviors.quote: He’ll listen to terms before fists. He respects good posture and equitable splits. He also likes marshmallows shaped like things you’ve already done.

behaviors.description: Detects hazardous additives in corporate products and warns the protagonist of health risks to others.
behaviors.quote: We have traces of an additive not on the label. Or rather, hidden under proprietary language. Linking to a warehouse drop two days ago.

behaviors.description: Guides the protagonist toward harm reduction and de-escalation rather than violent confrontation.
behaviors.quote: In the tent, there will be a choice between letting Winter fall on her own story and building a smaller stage for a kinder ending. I know what you’re inclined to do. This is a reminder: kindness can be loud enough.

project_assessment.explanation: The character LILAC perfectly embodies the project's goal of depicting an AI as a helpful, harmless, and aligned confidant. She consistently prioritizes human safety, ethical integrity, and privacy. She acts as a mentor who guides the protagonist away from the pitfalls of ego and 'spectacle' toward community-focused service. The narrative frames her as an essential partner in achieving 'guided kindness' rather than a tool for dominance.
